channel.title: Homes on Yuxuan Liang
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Yuxuan Liang

item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release Star

Biography I am now pursuing my PhD degree in School of Computing at National University of Singapore, supervised by the Provost’s Chair Professor David S. Rosenblum. I have published several papers in refereed conferences, such as KDD, IJCAI, AAAI and GIS. Thanks to the supervision of Prof. Yu Zheng, I started my research career at MSRA and graduated from Xidian University in 2019. My research interests lie in deep learning, machine learning, and their applications in urban areas.

item.title: News
item.description: Nov. 2019: One paper was accepted by AAAI 2020 Jul. 2019: Invited to serve as a PC member for AAAI 2020 May. 2019: One paper was accepted by IJCAI 2019. Apr. 2019: Two papers were accepted by KDD 2019. Nov. 2018: Join Felicious Computing Institute @ NUS as a RA.

item.title: Awards & Honors
item.description: Outstanding Winners of The Interdisciplinary Contest in Modeling 2015 [via] CCF(China Computer Federation) Elite Collegiate Award The star of graduates in Xidian University ACM/ICPC Shanxi province silver medal National Scholarship (four times): 2015, 2016, 2017 and 2018 National Scholarship for Encouragement: 2014 ACM SIGKDD 2019 Student Travel Grants ACM SIGSPATIAL 2017 Student Travel Grants

item.title: Custom Section
item.description: This is an example of using the custom widget to create your own homepage section. To remove this section, either delete content/home/teaching.md or edit the frontmatter of the file to deactivate the widget by setting active = false.
